summary: A very dim version of Candlight
descriptionHtml:
This is a quick and dirty mod I made that i figured I\'de throw for people who may want it, but don\'t know how to make it themselves.

I like the very dark dungeon mods, but I still want to be able to \"sort of\" see where I\'m going. The problem is, as far as I was concerned Candlelight and torches are just way too bright and ruin the whole point of having a dark dungeon. 

So, I quickly made a version of Candlelight that is VERY dim. It lights up the area in a very small radius, just enough so you can see what you\'re doing, but not enough to ruin the atmosphere.

The spell is named \"AegisLight\". The name doesn\'t hold any real significance I just needed something to identify it with real quick.

To use this mod, throw the ESP into your Data folder and activate it. Go ingame and type:

player.help Aegislight 4

then player.addspell (ID) 

ID being whatever the spell ID is.

I won\'t be making any edits on this mod. I won\'t be updating it, if you can\'t figure out how to use it... Sorry.
author: Sader
